Written by Jim Coyne - https://community.servicenow.com/people/jim.coyne
Populates the "Name" field with a lowercase version of the Question field. It will also replace any special characters with an underscore character (anything other than a-z, 0-9).
sys_ui_action.hint: Creates a string for the Name field based on the Question field
sys_ui_action.name: Set Name from Question
